actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to allow containers for certain petroleum products and derivatives to be temporarily imported without payment of duty.

summary.text: Permits, under the Tariff Schedules of the United States, containers for specified petroleum products and derivatives, including gasoline, solvents, kerosene, fuel oil, petroleum jelly, paraffin wax and asphalt, to be temporarily imported without payment of duty. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to allow containers for certain petroleum products and derivatives to be temporarily imported without payment of duty.
